description:
Pesche`s unusual ability allows Uryu to damage Cirucci. Cirucci releases her Zanpakuto and attacks the two until she has them cornered. Uryu uses Seeleschneider, the only bladed Quincy weapon, to counter her attacks as they get closer and closer. With Seeleschneider Uryu is able to cut through Cirucci`s feathers. Figuring that her attacks will no longer that work against Uryu, Cirucci does something unexpected
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ishida no Kirifuda, Tamashii o Kirisaku Mono
石田の切り札, 魂を切り裂くもの
